name: Tiny Hero in the RE-ROLLGEON
description:
Help the Tiny Hero to explore the RE-ROLLGEON.
To do this, choose the dice that will allow him to do the most damage (click on them).
But be careful when selecting your dice, at the same time you are also selecting the opponent's dice.
In the right side of each skill, you can find its dice cost.
Reroll the dice you don't want by clicking on the button at the bottom of the screen.

You can press enter or space to skip a level.

--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

I am a french student in software engineering and this is my first game jam and obviously not everything went well. However I am happy with this quarter of game planned at the start of the jam.

It's a shame you missed the interesting part where the enemies change the faces of your dice with their skills. But these are the rules. I will be better next time.

Feel free to say what you think of the game!
